about_the_game:
About the Game
Rise of the Atman is a open-world, action-adventure set on the dystopian isles of Utopus. You play as a mysterious nomad outlander that rescues a diminished party of refugees fleeing the civilized lands, now torn by war. You can customize your character, skillset, equipment, and even the town of Oasis. Your choices, actions, or lack of either, will shape your character, your town, it's inhabitants, and the balance of the world around you.

About the Hero
Name and design the champion of Oasis, a mysterious Nomad defined by your choices.

About the Isles
Explore the sprawling Isles of Utopus, an endearing and dangerous world of quirky characters, forgotten mysteries, and raging war.

About the Objective
Rebuild the long abandoned town of Oasis, rescue and shelter the downtrodden, and pass judgement on the Isle of Utopus.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains graphic violence and mature topics that might not be suitable for all ages.

short_description: A Fantasy, Open-World, RPG of adventure, cost, and reward, where the player determines their choices and then chooses between them. Champion the forsaken and forge them into a nation, or watch it all burn and take everything for yourself.
